Ticket.views module¶

Ticket.views.aftercanceltickets(request)¶

This method is used to Cancel the ticket and Send a email.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a CancelTicket Page which is a HTML page and Sends an email.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Ticket.views.aftercomplain(request)¶

This method is used to Submit the Complain page in Database.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns to a blank Complain Page again which is a HTML page and delivers a message.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Ticket.views.afterpostponetickets(request)¶

This method is used to Postpone trip of user and update Database.Also sends a confirmation email.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a PostponeTicket Page which is a HTML page and Sends an Email.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Ticket.views.aftertickets(request)¶

This method is used to Save details required to buy ticket in Database and send a confirmation email to user.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a ShowTicketDetails page which is a HTML page and Sends an Email.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Ticket.views.buytickets(request)¶

This method is used to view the BuyTicket page.User buys ticket online using this page.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a BuyTicket page which is a HTML page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Ticket.views.canceltickets(request)¶

This method is used to view the Cancel ticket Form. User put their ticket Id to cancel their ticket.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a CancelTicket Page which is a HTML page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Ticket.views.complains(request)¶

This method is used to view the Complain Form page.User submit their complain in the Form.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a Complain Page which is a HTML page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Ticket.views.fare(request)¶

This method is used to view the Fare Chart page.If we search using a Source and Destination

it will return the Fare for that specific route.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a Fare page which is a HTML page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Ticket.views.genticket(request)¶

This method is used to generate ticket pdf for use.

Parameters

request (FileResponse.) – it’s a FileResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a Ticket.pdf which is a Pdf File.

Return type

FileResponse.

Ticket.views.postponetickets(request)¶

This method is used to view the Postpone ticket Form. User puts their ticketId and Dates to postpone their trip.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a PostponeTicket Page which is a HTML page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

Ticket.views.seecomplains(request)¶

This method is used to view complain the login page to the Adminstrator. Administrator can see all submitted complains here.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a SeeComplain Page which is a HTML page.

Return type

HttpResponse.

This method is used to view the Home.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – it’s a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

this method returns a Home Page which is a HTML page.

Return type

HttpResponse.
